title: Piscataway Park: News Releases
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               News Releases           Subscribe  | What is RSS     July 28, 2016  Second Fort Washington Marina informational meeting scheduled for September 19  Please join us at the Accokeek Public Library on September 19 from 7 to 8 p.m.   June 29, 2016  National Park Service to resume operational responsibility at Fort Washington Marina  Fort Washington Marina has been managed by the Maryland Department of Natural Resources since 1986 through a cooperative agreement with the National Park Service. Both agencies are committed to ensuring a smooth transition and uninterrupted visitor services at Fort Washington Marina.
